title: This popular smart robot vacuum is even more affordable for one day only
text:
This popular smart robot vacuum is even more affordable for one day only

"Alexa, tell Deebot to clean." (Photo: Ecovacs)

Although I don't own any pets, I kind of view my robot vacuum as one. These little vacs scoot around your floors picking up all the crumbs you've dropped—not unlike a dog, to be honest. If you're in the market to add one of these small but mighty cleaning assistants to your home, right now you can get one of the most popular smart robot vacuums out there—the Ecovacs Deebot N79S—for a super affordable price.

As one of Amazon's featured Deals of the Day on this fine Sunday, the Deebot N79S is available for just $140, but only for today. It usually retails for $200, so you can save a cool $60 and scoop up a cleaning device to keep your floors looking spick and span this holiday season—or perhaps give the gift of tidy floors to a loved one instead.

The N79S was a solid contender when we tested the best smart robot vacuums of 2019. We found that it had a pretty good cleaning power and was easy to set up. Its best feature, though, is its smart capability. Not only can you can control it from an easy-to-use app on your phone, but you can also use Alexa connectivity to take your laziness to the next level by simply saying, "Alexa, tell Deebot to clean." Basically, you'll never have to lift a finger again to get clean floors.

Reminder: This sale is only good for today, October 27, so don't hesitate if you think it's the right fit for you.
